{{Quote|And we can burn Highpoint to the fucking ground!|[[Royland Degore]]|The Lost Lords}}
'''Highpoint''' is a castle situated in the [[The North|North]] of [[Westeros]]. It is the seat of [[House Whitehill]], staunch vassals of [[House Bolton]].
sections.In the books: Although House Whitehill exists in the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' universe, the name of their seat is never revealed.
sections.History:
===Background===
Highpoint, as it's name suggests, is situated upon a steep hill somewhere in the North. This hill was once covered by a dense ironwood forest, which was stripped bare. The barren hill then became the sigil of House Whitehill.
==="[[Iron From Ice]]"===
AfterÂ [[Ethan Forrester]] is murdered by [[Ramsay Bolton|Ramsay Snow]], his younger brother Ryon is taken to Highpoint as Ludd Whitehill's ward.
